import { useState } from 'react'; import Countdown from "react-countdown"; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { CardMedia, CardTitle, CardProduct, CardBtn, TitleH5, MetaInfo, FeaturedCountdown, ButtonPlaceBid, Tags } from './styles'; const Card = data => { const [modalShow, setModalShow] = useState(false); const openModal = () => { setModalShow(true) }; return ( {data.item.wishlist !== undefined ? data.item.wishlist : ''} You are good to go! openModal() } className="sc-button style-place-bid style bag fl-button pri-3">Place Bid "{data.item.name ? data.item.name : data.item.title}" {data.item.tags || 'tag'}
Creator
{data.item.nameAuthor !== undefined ? data.item.nameAuthor : 'Shiba Satoshi'}
Current Bid
{data.item.price !== undefined ? data.item.price : '5 ETH'}
 ) } export default Card;
